info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 6:29AM CDT until June 21 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...
Green River at Rochester affecting Muhlenberg, Ohio and Butler Counties.
.Recent heavy rain will cause the river to rise.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Green River at Rochester.
* WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 36.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 34.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 38.1 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 38.1 feet on 03/12/1995. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Butler, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Ohio, KY
